data.what_is: SwiftAgent is a lightweight marketing app thatalso manages contacts.
data.product_description: SwiftAgent is a lightweight marketing app thatalso manages contacts.

initial_reviews.review_title: Swiftly work for developing apps over SWIFT
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SwiftAgent?
It's one of the best developing language for iOS app development. It's not a complex platform to use.. it's very user friendly.

What do you dislike about SwiftAgent?
The most important of them all is the speed while using the language. It is very slow as compared to other programing language softwares.

Recommendations to others considering SwiftAgent:
I recommend it for initial development purpose or for iOS platform users.

What problems is SwiftAgent solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helped me to learn and develop simple applications for iOS platform. I had used it to develop a small gaming application.
